message.content: {"id": "20249", "title": "Bug 20249 - Change editor/view/perspective F1 help missing", "description": "When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 is supposed to display some help. However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read. The F1 key should keep the help window open for the user to read the contents properly.", "OB": "Pressing F1 while the change editor menu is open should display help and keep the help window open until the user closes it.", "EB": "The help window closes immediately after pressing F1 in the change editor menu without allowing the user to read the contents.", "SR": "Ensure that pressing F1 in the change editor menu displays help and keeps the help window open until the user closes it."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '20249', 'title': 'Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help', 'description': 'Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Build F2When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 will display some help.However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read.If there is supposed to be F1 defined for the change editor menu, then the helpwindow should stay open for the user to read.
